member.name: IAppxBundleWriter2.AddExternalPackageReference
member.summary: Adds a reference to an external package to the package bundle.
member.param: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.
An that provides the contents of fileName. The stream must support , , and .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleWriter2
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for bundle packages.
